reviewText:
Arc the Lad may have started slower then most anime, but now in this 5th volume old secrets are coming back to haunt the characters.
  Elk is thrown into the greatest struggle of his life as he finally confronts the man who killed his family. With the Spirit Shield destroyed there is no where to hide. Clive is lurking around very corner, ready to unleash his sinister plan. (and yes, it's sinister)
  I can't recommend this show more! It's a definite must see.
